name: Planned Graph
Pareto Chart
format:
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/Chart.js/2.9.3/Chart.min.js"></script>
<canvas id="paretoChart" style="height:400px;"></canvas>

<script>
    let scope = this;  // <-- Add this line

    let chart;

    function createParetoChart(barData) {
        const ctx = document.getElementById('paretoChart').getContext('2d');
        
        const labels = barData.map(d => d.label);
        const barValues = barData.map(d => d.value);

        const sortedData = [...barData].sort((a, b) => b.value - a.value);
        const sortedLabels = sortedData.map(d => d.label);
        const sortedValues = sortedData.map(d => d.value);

        const total = sortedValues.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0);
        let cumulative = 0;
        const cumulativePercent = sortedValues.map(val => {
            cumulative += val;
            return ((cumulative / total) * 100).toFixed(2);
        });

        if (chart) {
            chart.destroy();
        }

        chart = new Chart(ctx, {
            type: 'bar',
            data: {
                labels: sortedLabels,
                datasets: [
                    {
                        label: "Downtime (Min)",
                        data: sortedValues,
                        backgroundColor: "rgba(55,162,235,0.5)",
                        borderColor: "#37a2eb",
                        yAxisID: 'left',
                        order: 1
                    },
                    {
                        label: "Cumulative %",
                        data: cumulativePercent,
                        type: 'line',
                        borderColor: "#ff6384",
                        fill: false,
                        yAxisID: 'right',
                        order: 0
                    }
                ]
            },
            options: {
                maintainAspectRatio: false,
                legend: { display: true },
                scales: {
                    yAxes: [
                        {
                            id: 'left',
                            position: 'left',
                            scaleLabel: {
                                display: true,
                                labelString: 'Downtime (Min)'
                            },
                            ticks: {
                                beginAtZero: true
                            }
                        },
                        {
                            id: 'right',
                            position: 'right',
                            scaleLabel: {
                                display: true,
                                labelString: 'Cumulative %'
                            },
                            ticks: {
                                beginAtZero: true,
                                callback: function(value) {
                                    return value + '%';
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    ],
                    xAxes: [{
                        offset: true
                    }]
                },
                tooltips: {
                    mode: 'index',
                    intersect: false,
                    callbacks: {
                        label: function(tooltipItem, data) {
                            const label = data.datasets[tooltipItem.datasetIndex].label || '';
                            const value = tooltipItem.yLabel;
                            return label.includes('%') ? `${label}: ${value}%` : `${label}: ${value}`;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        });
    }

    scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(payload) {
        console.log("Chart payload:", payload);  // Debug
        if (Array.isArray(payload)) {
            createParetoChart(payload);
        }
    });
</script>

format:
<!-- Chart.js CDN -->
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/Chart.js/2.9.3/Chart.min.js"></script>

<!-- Chart Canvas -->
<canvas id="unplannedTop5Chart" style="height: 400px;"></canvas>

<script>
    let top5Chart;

    function renderTop5Chart(data) {
        if (!Array.isArray(data) || data.length === 0) {
            console.warn("No data received for Top 5 chart.");
            return;
        }

        const labels = data.map(item => item.label);
        const values = data.map(item => item.value);
        const colors = ['#AEC7E8', '#98DF8A', '#FF7F0E', '#DDF23A', '#F03DCF'];

        const ctx = document.getElementById("unplannedTop5Chart").getContext("2d");

        if (top5Chart) {
            top5Chart.destroy();
        }

        top5Chart = new Chart(ctx, {
            type: 'bar',
            data: {
                labels: labels,
                datasets: [{
                    label: "Top 5 Unplanned (Min)",
                    data: values,
                    backgroundColor: colors,
                }]
            },
            options: {
                maintainAspectRatio: false,
                legend: { display: false },
                indexAxis: 'y',
                scales: {
                    xAxes: [{
                        scaleLabel: {
                            display: true,
                            labelString: "Downtime (Min)"
                        },
                        ticks: {
                            beginAtZero: true
                        }
                    }],
                    yAxes: [{
                        offset: true
                    }]
                },
                tooltips: {
                    callbacks: {
                        label: function(tooltipItem, data) {
                            return `${data.datasets[tooltipItem.datasetIndex].label}: ${tooltipItem.xLabel}`;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        });
    }

    // Node-RED context
    (function(scope) {
        scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(payload) {
            console.log("Updated payload for Top 5 chart:", payload);
            renderTop5Chart(payload);
        });
    })(this);
</script>

var lpm = flow.get("LPM") || 0;   // Get LPM value (default to 0 if undefined)
var lps = lpm / 60;               // Convert LPM to LPS

var accum = flow.get("accum2") || 0; // Retrieve previous accumulated value
accum = accum + lps;               // Add LPS to accumulated value

flow.set("accum2", accum);          // Store updated accumulated value

msg.payload = accum;               // Send accumulated value as output
return msg;

    }

    0: "Trip",
    1: "Running",

};

};
